misc: Rarely uses his driver, which has raised questions about his masculinity.
biography: Ossi, a member of Kullo Golf Club, is a consistent presence at the annual Hector Trophée, having competed in the tournament in 2022, 2024, and 2025.  While Ossi has yet to claim victory in the prestigious team competition, his dedication and steady performance year after year make him a player to watch.

A unique aspect of Ossi's game is his infrequent use of the driver. This unconventional approach has certainly sparked discussions within the golfing community, but it hasn't seemed to hinder his overall success.  His strategic approach to the course clearly demonstrates a deep understanding of the game.

Although Ossi has not yet earned the Hector Trophée or the Victor trophy, his persistent participation and consistent performances are noteworthy. He is certainly one to watch for in future tournaments, and his unique style adds intrigue to his gameplay.
